.component--embed-view--featured-topics--block-homepage-featured-topics .viewsreference--view-title { color: #212121; font-family: "Merriweather Bold"; font-size: 1.5rem; text-align: center; padding: 3.5rem 0; margin: 0; }

.component--embed-view--featured-topics--block-homepage-featured-topics .view-content { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr)); justify-items: center; grid-gap: 1rem; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 1140px; padding: 0 1rem 3.5rem; }
